title: Artificial intelligence can be used in the identification and classification of shoulder osteoarthritis and avascular necrosis on plain radiographs: a training study of 7,139 …
details: M Magnéli, M Axenhus, J Fagrell, L Petter, J Gislén… - Acta Orthopaedica, 2024
abstract: Background and purpose Knowledge concerning the use AI models for the classification of glenohumeral osteoarthritis (GHOA) and avascular necrosis (AVN) of the humeral head is lacking. We aimed to analyze how a deep learning (DL) model …
